channel.title: Akyut - Echoes [Electro]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/akyut/02-echoes
Don't know if I'll be posting anything else for quite a while. As always, any and all feedback is appreciated, thank you for listening!

item.title: Akyut - Echoes [Electro]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Cool I hear ya, life gets in the way sometimes right? Best of luck and I’ll be keeping my eyes peeled

Read full topic

item.title: Akyut - Echoes [Electro]
item.dc:creator: Akyut
item.description:
Thanks! And yeah, I’ve just lost a ton of the drive/motivation I once had, and things are looking spotty off the net. Trying to finish a degree on top of that, so I don’t really have much in the way of time or inspiration.

I’m not going to be gone forever (hopefully), and I’m still going to finish out this album.

Read full topic

item.title: Akyut - Echoes [Electro]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I like it! Definitely digging the flying arp. The shift around 2:17 is awesome.

Not gonna post anything for awhile? That’s sad I’ve really enjoyed the last two things you put out there

But aight. I’m following you anyway so if you upload anything I’ll know…

Read full topic
